body.p: Some respondents stated that disclosure of a withdrawal liability should not be required because different plans or jurisdictions use different assumptions to determine the withdrawal amount, and therefore the amounts are not comparable. The Board did not agree with that view. The amount required to withdraw from a plan faithfully represents the obligation, whether that amount is determined on the same basis as for another plan or on a different basis. If the amounts are determined on the basis of different underlying requirements, the actual amounts required to withdraw will differ.
